title: With Yau Kai in Hong Kong
creator_credit: Gail Singer, David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
brief_description: Takes a look at the life style of a 14 year old boy who lives in on a sampan in one of the harbours near Hong Kong. Highlights aspect of commerce and trade in the area and the intrusion of Western values in a traditional life style.
creator_credit_for_label: Gail Singer, David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
